welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mostoles, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barajas Airport, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
